name: Left Hand vs Right Hand
description:
Disclaimer:

You NEED a PC-friendly controller to play this game.
Keyboard and Mouse controls currently do not exist.

Requires:

Two Players / One Controller

Description:

Made in 48 hours (and a bunch of free assets) for the first Esports Game Jam in 2019!

Two players must pit head-to-head in a platforming race to collect the most coins.
The only caveat: They must fight one another using the same controller!

Controls:
Player One:
Left Analog Stick - Movement / Menu Navigation
Left Shoulder Button - Crouch / Menu Select
Left Trigger - Jump
Back button - Open Pause Menu

Player Two:
Right Analog Stick - Movement / Menu Navigation
Right Shoulder Button - Crouch / Menu Select
Right Trigger - Jump
Start button - Open Pause Menu

Created by:

David Newel and Thomas Ferrick

Source code:

https://github.com/deadcamper/esports_game_jam_2019
